about: Hi, my name (I guess you could say IGN) is tohooper.  I mostly play Nebula. I would like to murder spleefers, because they only make your free time (which can be very limited) unbelievably  miserable. I love this server. It is probably the second best server I have ever played on. The first I will not name because I would most likely be deleted from this website (and I don't think it is still up and running anyways) but my favorite server ever was the first one I ever played mine craft on. If you are trying to find my real name, I can not help you. But the only thing I know about myself is that I think I live somewhere in Oklahoma.
